author: alice
sql: CREATE TABLE customers (id BIGINT NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT customers_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id));

author: bob
sql: CREATE TABLE invoices (id BIGINT NOT NULL, customer_id BIGINT NOT NULL, amount numeric(12, 2) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT invoices_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id));

author: bob
sql: ALTER TABLE customers ADD phone VARCHAR(50);

author: alice
sql:
CREATE INDEX idx_invoices_customer ON invoices(customer_id);
ALTER TABLE invoices ADD CONSTRAINT fk_invoices_customer FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers (id);

author: alice
sql: CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY idx_customers_email ON customers (email);
